DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate effect single repeat administration GW876008 metabolism midazolam healthy volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: An Investigation To Determine The Potential Interaction Effect Between GW876008 And Midazolam .
DOC.criteria: Healthy male female . Normal ECG . Agree remain clinic time define protocol . Subjects must agree abstain alcohol 24 hour prior start dose collection final pharmacokinetic sample . Any serious medical disorder condition . Any history endocrine disorder . Any clinically significant laboratory abnormality . History psychiatric illness . Any history suicidal attempt behavior . Active peptic ulcer disease . Positive faecal occult blood . The subject smoke smoke use nicotinecontaining product last six month . Women positive serum HCG pregnancy test screening , positive urine pregnancy test admission Unit inhouse period , willing use acceptable method contraception lactate plan become pregnant within three month follow screen visit .
